title: Highlight 'प्रवेश के लिए आवेदन करें' button with a distinct contrasting color

requirements.summary: Update the 'प्रवेश के लिए आवेदन करें' (Apply for Admission) call-to-action button in the home page hero section to use a distinct, visually contrasting highlight color (e.g., emerald green, royal blue, or vibrant accent) that makes it stand out prominently from the existing saffron/gold/deep-red theme while maintaining readability and appropriate hover/focus states
acceptanceCriteria: The 'प्रवेश के लिए आवेदन करें' button on the home page hero section renders in a distinct highlight color that is clearly different from the saffron/gold/deep-red palette used by other elements.
The button color contrasts visually with the hero section background and surrounding buttons, making it the most prominent CTA on the page.
The button has a visible hover/focus state that complements the chosen highlight color.
Button text remains fully legible against the new background color.
All other buttons and UI elements on the home page retain their existing styling unchanged.

file_operations.description: Update the 'प्रवेश के लिए आवेदन करें' button styling to use a distinct highlight color (e.g., emerald-600/emerald-700 for hover) that contrasts with the existing warm saffron/gold/deep-red theme. Ensure the button retains white text for legibility and includes appropriate hover and focus states. Do not modify any other buttons or hero section elements.
